name: Velcro
overview: Velcro, by Wilfried Elmenreich was released at the bitbitJAM#4 in 2017. In it, you are Velcro, the world's best shepherd dog. Velcro has been born with a unique mutation. His fur has tiny hooks which attach to the wooley sheep on contact. This way, Velcro can gather the sheep faster than any other dog. So round them up, Velcro!
